definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Drink brings out the beast in him.
As a matter of fact, we tend to describe a merciless fight between humans as animal-like.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們往往將人類之間的冷血爭鬥形容成獸性。

sentences.english: The libidinal is the animal part.
sentences.chinese: 力比多的是獸性的那部分。

sentences.english: She sees both the animality and the artifice.
sentences.chinese: 她看到了獸性和技巧性。

sentences.english: Where there is triviality, there is sin and animality .
sentences.chinese: 有薄淺狹隘的地方，就有罪惡與獸性。

definition: to watch the fires burning across the river/to delay entering the fray until all others have been exhausted by fighting amongst themselves (idiom)
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to throw off/to struggle free of/Taiwan pr. [zheng1 tuo1]
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
